meanings.definition: A connection or relationship between things or people.
meanings.sent1: My associations with my childhood friends bring back happy memories.
meanings.sent2: The business associations between the two companies led to a successful partnership.
meanings.sent3: The cat's associations with the toy mouse made for a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: Her associations with the past were like threads weaving through her present.
meanings.sent5: The associations of trust and loyalty made their bond unbreakable.

meanings.definition: A group of people organized for a joint purpose.
meanings.sent1: The local associations worked together to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: Being part of the student associations allowed me to make new friends.
meanings.sent3: The associations of bakers decided to have a pie-eating contest.
meanings.sent4: Their associations resembled a well-oiled machine, working seamlessly together.
meanings.sent5: The associations of volunteers made a significant impact on the community.

meanings.definition: The mental connection between ideas or feelings.
meanings.sent1: Her associations between colors and emotions were unique.
meanings.sent2: Studying psychology helped me understand the associations our brain makes.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's associations between jokes and puns always made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist's associations between brush strokes and emotions were truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The associations of fear and darkness haunted his dreams.
